item.title: PHYS105-recitation-20200331
item.description: Angular motion questions # HW Questions # 1 5 Since traveling less than ideal speed the car slides down the bank. 6 Another problem # A pendulum swings back and forth with a given length 2m. (Similar to quiz) It is moving tangenital at 8 m/s What is the radial or centripetal acceleration? What is the tangential acceleration? What is the tension in the string?
